attributes.action: Make Britain a great country again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the PM to abolish political correctness to make Britain a great country again.  At present the worry of offending someone by celebrating St George’s day or schools not having a sports day anymore in case someone looses or get hurts - hence why we are not competitive at international sports.  As for Christmas, in this country we celebrate this holiday and if this offends anyone, then tough!  I have no issues with any other religion celebrating their holidays so why should we have some fool telling us not put lights up.  We need the PM to act now before we are offended anymore by these do gooders.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
